00034 include_once("../../include.inc.php");
00035 
00036 $rulenumber = $_GET['rulenumber'];
00037 $rule = $_SESSION['pfw']->table->rules[$rulenumber];
00038 
00039 if ($_SESSION['edit']['type'] != 'table') {
00040     unset ($_SESSION['edit']['save']);
00041     $_SESSION['edit']['type'] = 'table';
00042 }
00043 
00044 if ($_SESSION['edit']['rulenumber'] != $rulenumber) {
00045     unset ($_SESSION['edit']['save']);
00046     $_SESSION['edit']['rulenumber'];
00047 }
00048 
00049 if (!isset($_SESSION['edit']['save']) && isset($rule['identifier'])) {
00050     unset ($_SESSION['edit']['save']);
00051     $_SESSION['edit']['save'] = $_SESSION['pfw']->table->rules[$rulenumber];
00052 }
00053 
00054 if (isset($_GET['dropvalue'])) {
00055     $_SESSION['pfw']->table->delEntity ("data", $_GET['rulenumber'], $_GET['dropvalue']);
00056     reload();
00057 }
00058 
00059 if (isset($_GET['dropfile'])) {
00060     $_SESSION['pfw']->table->delEntity ("file", $_GET['rulenumber'], $_GET['dropfile']);
00061     reload();
00062 }
00063 
00064 if (isset($_POST['addvalue']) && !strpos($_POST['addvalue'], "networks")) {
00065     foreach (preg_split("/[\s,]+/", $_POST['addvalue']) as $value) {
00066         $_SESSION['pfw']->table->addEntity("data", $rulenumber, trim($value));
00067     }
00068     reload();
00069 }
00070 
00071 if (isset($_POST['addfile']) && ($_POST['addfile'] != "filename")) {
00072     $_SESSION['pfw']->table->addEntity("file", $rulenumber, preg_replace("/\"/", "", $_POST['addfile']));
00073     reload();
00074 }
00075 
00076 if (count($_POST)) {
00077     $_SESSION['pfw']->table->rules[$rulenumber]['identifier'] =     "<". preg_replace("/[<>]/", "", $_POST['identifier']). ">";
00078     $_SESSION['pfw']->table->rules[$rulenumber]['const'] =      ($_POST['const'] ? true : false);
00079     $_SESSION['pfw']->table->rules[$rulenumber]['persist'] =        ($_POST['persist'] ? true : false);
00080     $_SESSION['pfw']->table->rules[$rulenumber]['comment'] =        $_POST['comment'];
00081     $rule = $_SESSION['pfw']->table->rules[$rulenumber];
00082 }
00083 
00084 /*
00085 * go back
00086 */
00087 if (isset($_POST['cancelme']) && ($_POST['cancelme'] == 'cancel')) {
00088     $_SESSION['pfw']->table->rules[$rulenumber] = $_SESSION['edit']['save'];
00089     unset ($_SESSION['edit']);
00090     if (!isset($_SESSION['pfw']->table->rules[$rulenumber]['identifier'])) {
00091         $_SESSION['pfw']->table->del ($rulenumber);
00092     }
00093     header ("Location: table.php");
00094 }
00095 
00096 if (isset($_POST['save']) && $_POST['save'] == "save and return") {
00097     unset ($_SESSION['edit']);
00098     header ("Location: table.php");
00099 }
00100 
00101 /*
00102 * Begin Output
00103 */
00104 
00105 $active = "table";
00106 page_header("Edit Table");
00107 ?>

00126

00128                 <input type="checkbox" id="persist" name="persist" value="persist" <?php print ($rule['persist'] ? "checked=\"checked\"" : "")?> />
00129             </td>

00131                 <?php
00132                 if (isset($rule['data'])) {
00133                     foreach ($rule['data'] as $data) {
00134                         print "$data ";
00135                         print "<a href=\"". $_SERVER['PHP_SELF']. "?rulenumber=$rulenumber&amp;dropvalue=$data\">del</a>";
00136                         print "<br />";
00137                     }
00138                 }
00139                 if (isset($rule['file'])) {
00140                     if (is_array($rule['file'])) {
00141                         foreach ($rule['file'] as $file) {
00142                             print "file \"$file\" ";
00143                             print "<a href=\"". $_SERVER['PHP_SELF']. "?rulenumber=$rulenumber&amp;dropfile=$file\">del</a>";
00144                             print "<br />";
00145                         }
00146                     } else {
00147                         print "file \"". $rule['file']. "\" ";
00148                         print "<a href=\"". $_SERVER['PHP_SELF']. "?rulenumber=$rulenumber&amp;dropfile='". $rule['file']. "'\">del</a>";
00149                     }
00150                 }
00151                 if (isset($rule['data']) || isset($rule['file'])) {
00152                     print "<div class=\"add\">";
00153                 }
00154                 ?>
00155                 <label for="addfile">add file</label><br />
00156                 <input type="text" id="addfile" name="addfile" size="30" value="filename" 
00157                             onfocus="if (addfile.value=='filename') addfile.value = '' " 
00158                             onblur="if (addfile.value == '') addfile.value = 'filename'" />
00159                 <br />
00160                 <label for="addvalue">add hosts or networks</label><br />
00161                 <textarea id="addvalue" name="addvalue" cols="30" rows="5" 
00162                             onfocus="if (addvalue.value=='hosts or networks separated by comma, space or newline') addvalue.value = '' " 
00163                             onblur="if (addvalue.value == '') addvalue.value = 'hosts or networks separated by comma, space or newline'">hosts or networks separated by comma, space or newline</textarea>
00164                 <?php
00165                 if (isset($rule['data'])) {
00166                     print "</div>";
00167                 }
00168                 ?>
00169             </td>
00170 
00171             </tr>
00172 
00173             </table>

00175                 <tr>
00176                 <td class="last" style="white-space: nowrap">
00177                     <label for="comment">Comment</label>
00178                     <input type="text" id="comment" name="comment" value="<?php print $rule['comment'];?>" size="80" style="width: 90%" />
00179                 </td>

00186             </div>
